meanings.definition: Connections between two or more things.
meanings.sent1: The interconnections between the different parts of the machine ensure it runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The internet relies on interconnections between servers to transmit data.
meanings.sent3: The interconnections between the puzzle pieces made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: The interconnections of friendship weave a strong bond between people.
meanings.sent5: The interconnections in nature show how everything is intertwined and dependent on each other.

meanings.definition: The state of being connected with each other.
meanings.sent1: The interconnections within the family create a sense of unity and support.
meanings.sent2: Globalization has led to increased interconnections between countries.
meanings.sent3: The interconnections in the plot of the movie kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent4: The interconnections of thoughts in her mind formed a complex web of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The interconnections between cultures enrich our understanding of diversity.
